social_media.overview: Coral Beach & Tennis Club maintains an active presence on social media platforms to share club news, events, beautiful scenery, and connect with members and guests.

facebook.description: Official Facebook page featuring club updates, event announcements, and beautiful photography of our Bermuda location.

instagram.description: Visual showcase of club life, stunning beach views, dining experiences, and member activities through beautiful photography.

x_twitter.description: Real-time updates, news, and quick announcements from Coral Beach & Tennis Club.

content_highlights.beach_and_scenery: Stunning photos of our 2,000 feet of pink sand beach, ocean views, and Bermudian sunsets
content_highlights.dining_experiences: Culinary showcases from our various restaurants and special dining events
content_highlights.events_and_activities: Tennis tournaments, social gatherings, cultural events, and member activities
content_highlights.club_facilities: Tours of our accommodations, recreational facilities, and beautiful grounds
content_highlights.bermuda_culture: Celebrations of local Bermudian traditions and culture
content_highlights.member_stories: Highlights of member experiences and club community

follow_for: Daily glimpses of life at CBC
engagement_guidelines.interaction: Members and guests are encouraged to follow, like, and share CBC content to stay connected with club life

chatbot_responses.social_media_inquiry: You can follow Coral Beach & Tennis Club on our official social media accounts: Facebook (@coralbeachclubbda), Instagram (@coralbeachbda), and X (@coralbeach00). We regularly share beautiful photos, event updates, and club news.
chatbot_responses.facebook_specific: Visit our Facebook page at facebook.com/coralbeachclubbda for club updates, event announcements, and community news.
chatbot_responses.instagram_specific: Follow us on Instagram @coralbeachbda for stunning photography of our beach, facilities, and dining experiences.
chatbot_responses.twitter_x_specific: Follow us on X (Twitter) @coralbeach00 for real-time updates and quick announcements from the club.

social_media.privacy_note: All social media content respects member privacy and follows club guidelines for photography and information sharing.
